PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2010-07672010-06-17,  HEALTH,  ,  , 
ActFood and Drugs Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Food and Drug Regulations (1558 - Food Additives)
PrecisRegulations Amending the FOOD AND DRUG REGULATIONS (1558 - Food Additives) in order to enable the use of the following food additives: - glycerol ester; - hydrogen peroxide; - microcrystalline cellulose: (0.2% and 9.0%) - sodium hydroxide; and - sucrose esters of fatty acide.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2010-0142 Publication Date: 2010-07-07
AttachmentsAttachment
